sentence.Network_en: The meadow, but a little while the heart - shaped celandine leaves will come in their accustomed place.
sentence.Network_cn: 草地上好像什么也没长, 不多一会儿,白屈菜的心脏形叶子会在原来的地方出现.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English, from Old French celidoine, from medieval Latin celidonia, based on Greek khelidōn 'swallow' (the flowering of the plant being associated with the arrival of swallows)

means.word_mean: 1. North American annual plant with usually yellow or orange flowers; grows chiefly on wet rather acid soil
2. perennial herb with branched woody stock and bright yellow flowers

auth_sentence.content: Mix juice of Celandine with Honey to the Thickness of Cream.
